description:
Spelunky 2 is an extremely difficult roguelike platformer where your progression is gated by multiworld unlocks.
Your ultimate goal is to complete one of the game's various paths. Your primary objective is to complete 'checks' by
discovering new journal entries, which sends an item from the multiworld into the item pool. The rewards you receive
can range from simple 'filler' items to world unlocks that allow you to progress, as well as key quest-chain items
like the Udjat Eye and Hou Yi's Bow. These critical items must be received from the multiworld before you can obtain
them in-game.

0.2.3.description:
# What's New
## New Archipelago-focused Graphics for sending items!
Now it's clear when you send an item to another player, and the level of importance.
(For example if the item [is a progression one](https://github.com/DDR-Khat/Spelunky2-Archipelago/blob/main/assets/progression.png) , it'll be clearer even if you don't know their game!)
Speaking of that...
## You sent item messages now actually work!
I accidentally broke the pop-up message because I was trying to reduce data the client received. D'oh! So now it works again by getting the data another way
## Some more fixes
- Corrected some of the images in the item alert box being the wrong one
- Corrected the pop-up message's text being able to spill outside
- _(Technically not a fix)_ If it doesn't succeed the TLS connection, it quietly re-attempts without. You'll know if it's secure or not when it says [Secure] Connected or [Fallback] connected

---
Huge thanks and respect to [Eszenn](https://github.com/Eszenn/) for all the work they did. Best of wishes to them.
0.2.3.title: Spelunky 2 Archipelago v0.2.3

0.2.4.description:
# What's New
## Progressive powerups are not automatically granted
If you receive a progressive powerup you will only get it on subsequent runs if you have the journal entry for it _(No more mysteriously spawning HouYi Bow)_
## Bug fixes!
- Reworked the popup so it doesn't rely on spawning entities _(which caused crashes)_
- Removed a old debug message accidentally left in
- Corrected spawning of items given which was causing them to end up in walls or something rather than the player's inventory

---
# Huge thanks and respect to [Eszenn](https://github.com/Eszenn/) for all the work they did. Best of wishes to them.
0.2.4.title: Spelunky 2 Archipelago v0.2.4

0.3.1.description:
This is just client update and is safe to work with 0.3.0 generated worlds or yamls
# What's New
Only some bug fixes
## Bug fixes!
- Cosmic Ocean correctly ends at the goal level you set, not the NEXT level.
- Corrected the logic handling characters to keep ones received from the APworld seperate from ones you've got journal entries for
- Fixed the Ushabti
---
# Huge thanks and respect to [Eszenn](https://github.com/Eszenn/) for all the work they did. Best of wishes to them.
## Big thanks still goes to @cloiss + (discord) ``activegalacticnucleus`` for their contributions to 0.3.0
0.3.1.title: Spelunky 2 Archipelago v0.3.1

0.3.2.description:
Mostly a client update, a very minor fix to the APworld itself. Safe with 0.3.0 or newer worlds and yamls.
# What's New
Only some bug fixes
## Bug fixes!
- Tiamat / Hundun win screens now send their locations correctly if you loop _(I'm an idiot and made a breaking change I missed)_
- Waddler Ushabti's get hot-swapped to prevent Qilin spawning inside Waddler (it's still the right one, take it to the next level)
- Adjusted savefile defaults to boost chances of character coffins
- Alien Compass non-Waddler upgrade _requires_ you have the Compass journal entry now _(so you still send the Compass check)_
- Cosmic Ocean goal's minimum is now 6 _(aka - you must get into and beat one level of CO)_
- Cosmic Ocean checkpoint count adjusted ( (goal / 10) - 1 -- aka for every 10 levels beyond the first, add one)
- The "fix" for Qilin's Ushabti's from 0.3.1 was dumb and made ALL Ushabti's Qilin ones... _(by the way, did I say I'm an idiot?)_
- Starting Wallet gets correctly updated even from a fresh start
0.3.2.title: Spelunky 2 Archipelago v0.3.2

0.3.3.description:
This is just client update and is safe to work with 0.3.0 generated worlds or yamls
# What's New
## New UI element!
At the top-right of your UI, there is now a globe icon -- if you cannot go to the next world ("World not unlocked" message) then it also has a gate over it
## Kali's rewards no longer disappear!
If Kali's altar tries to give you items that you've not yet unlocked, it'll try to swap it for something you would receive as a gift from achieving 8 favor (which if you can't receive anything from that list, defaults to a Bomb Bag). 
This includes rewards from Kali such as from dice -- but does NOT include the Eggplant (as the game will still give you the location for it.)
You no longer receive nothing :) Speaking of...
## Udjat Chest now gives you _something_
If you don't yet have the Udjat Eye, that gold key is still worth something! [Lamp oil, rope, bombs? You want it? it's yours, my friend! As long as you open the chest](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_wTxKHFZO90)!
## Hedjet/Crown is now only replaced if your close
"Dangit! If only you sent that check BEFORE I entered the level!" -- FEAR NOT! Now you can complain they didn't give you it as you were getting close to picking it up instead!
## Pop-ups have a "priority" system
No more "first come, first serve" business! More important to know if we got a world unlock versus another dang gold bar!!
## Bug fixes!
- Item popups causing the item queue to end up infinitely waiting if you did not yet have the (Bomb Bag/Rope Pile/Bomb Box/Cooked Turkey/Royal Jelly) it was trying to give you
---
# Huge thanks and respect to [Eszenn](https://github.com/Eszenn/) for all the work they did. Best of wishes to them.
## Big thanks still goes to @cloiss + (discord) ``activegalacticnucleus`` for their contributions to 0.3.0
0.3.3.title: Spelunky 2 Archipelago v0.3.3

0.3.4.description:
This is an update to both APworld + Client. Your client is fine with 0.3.4 -> 0.3.0 but worlds generated from 0.3.4 are not compatible with earlier clients due to some minor changes
# What's New
## Terra is no longer a pest!
Once you have met her once, she will stop pestering you to give you more resources to help with unlocking shortcuts _(because she isn't giving them; your getting them from the multi-world. Sorry momma!)_
## Easy difficulty has more locked items!
If you specifically lock some of the quest items on easy; only four are now excluded -- Arrow of Light, Hou Yi's Bow, Tablet of Destiny + Ushabti -- this is to alleviate some important items being gated behind them basically at the end of your game -- this used to be JUST the Alien Compass (Considered "Quest" because it's a quest-chain item)
## Excluded locations are now pre-discovered!
"Huh? I just got Lavamander? But I turned that off!" -- no more! You've already found it, and your journal reflects that now :)
## World-wrapping makes visual sense now!
"Wait, I was going into Tidepool, but I'm in Dwelling?" -- no more! If your being sent back the transition screen (for as brief as it is...) will correctly show where your going (It's real weird seeing Ice Caves -> Dwelling!!)
## The journal is multi-world updated!
When you receive a location if it's one from your own world and for _whatever reason_ your local game doesn't have that journal entry? it's automagically done now! You could technically have 2 people playing from the same slot and it'll sync up... (I think... feel free to try and let me know!) But at the very least if your save gets messed up somehow you can delete it and you lose **_no_** progress
## Bug fixes!
- Re-fixed character not being unlockable (I made a last-minute change and broke things bad... sorry!)
- The game properly closes the Archipelago connection if your quitting (TL;DR ? it closes instantly rather than linger for like... 3 seconds)
---
# Huge thanks and respect to [Eszenn](https://github.com/Eszenn/) for all the work they did. Best of wishes to them.
## Big thanks still goes to @cloiss + (discord) ``activegalacticnucleus`` for their contributions to 0.3.0
0.3.4.title: Spelunky 2 Archipelago v0.3.4

0.3.5.description:
This is an update to both APworld + Client. Anything prior to 0.3.5 will break.
# What's New
## Starting Character optionss
Those evil shopkeepers and Vlad have teamed up to capture Ana, Colin, Margaret and Roffy! But that's fine -- you can choose if they or other characters start free :)
## Bug fixes!
- Terra now _genuinely_ won't be a pest; I bribed her to actually listen this time.
- The crown can actually be acquired _(I forgot to check if the crown was unlocked, so I assumed it was locked and replaced it, DERP)_
- Ushabti's no longer magically disappear if you carry them through levels. _(Waddler was stealing them back... I asked him to stop doing that)_
- Alien Compass can now actually be received _(I messed the code up pretty bad here. It waited for you to receive 2 compasses; but you never could. So you never would get it... smh.)_
---
# Huge thanks and respect to [Eszenn](https://github.com/Eszenn/) for all the work they did. Best of wishes to them.
## Big thanks still goes to @cloiss + (discord) ``activegalacticnucleus`` for their contributions to 0.3.0
0.3.5.title: Spelunky 2 Archipelago v0.3.5

0.3.6.description:
This is an update to both APworld + Client. Anything prior to 0.3.5 will break.
# What's New
## Bug fixes!
- Kali Altar no longer errors when deleting items which could cause crashes
- Edge-case Back-worn items causing crashes when removed
- Shortcuts no longer go missing because you reached even further beyond worlds
- AP generation failing if all filler items are set to 0 (defaults to Gold Bars)
- AP rules not checking if you have access to Sunken City for your Cosmic Ocean unlock
- Ana / Margaret / Colin / Roffy no longer fail to show up to be rescued
- World count no longer ends up wrong if you get returned to your starting area
---
# Huge thanks and respect to [Eszenn](https://github.com/Eszenn/) for all the work they did. Best of wishes to them.
## Big thanks still goes to @cloiss + (discord) ``activegalacticnucleus`` for their contributions to 0.3.0
0.3.6.title: Spelunky 2 Archipelago v0.3.6

0.3.7.description:
This is an update to both APworld + Client. Anything prior to 0.3.5 will break.
# What's New
New Archipelago.json manifest which is now required (Nerd talk aside? Archipelago needs this file to know things as Archipelago 0.6.4 and newer)

## Bug fixes!
- Previous fix for crashing with back-worn items was causing MORE crashes, so removed that.
- Broken Sword logic now requires access to Excalibur (D'oh!) , thanks @sebysebyseby 
- Disconnecting no longer retains previous sessions data
- Ankh is now logically required before you can get the "Tablet of Destiny" for Hard or higher difficulty
---
# Huge thanks and respect to [Eszenn](https://github.com/Eszenn/) for all the work they did. Best of wishes to them.
## Big thanks still goes to @cloiss + (discord) ``activegalacticnucleus`` for their contributions to 0.3.0

# [Installation Steps here](https://github.com/DDR-Khat/Spelunky2-Archipelago?tab=readme-ov-file#installation-instructions)
0.3.7.title: Spelunky 2 Archipelago v0.3.7

0.3.8.description:
This is an update to both APworld + Client. Anything prior to 0.3.5 will break.
# What's New
## A bunch of "Skip" logic options! 
Now by default the multiworld's logic will not assume you know how to perform Udjat Skip (getting to Blackmarket/Vlad's Castle without it), Ankh Skip (in Tidepool), Excalibur skip (Killing Kingu without excalibur) or Qilin Skip (getting into Sunken City without Qilin).
If you are able to do these things, then you can turn them on.
## Deathlink Amnesty!
You can now configure how many deaths you must suffer (0 -> 10) before your death will send a deathlink into the multiworld.
## Minor deathlink flavour messages
If you send a deathlink, for clients that acknowledge them they receive a short explanation of why you died.
## Journal page shows you unlocked worlds!
If you don't know what worlds you have access and don't want to use an external client, you can now open your Journal and there are critters that will light up showing which areas you have access to! (Big thanks to (discord) ``noitroxy`` for prototyping and providing their code for positional guidance)

## Bug fixes!
- Terra Tunnel, Guy Spelunky + Classic Guy _**correctly**_ addressed and are now completable locations
- The globe icon no longer shows "unlocked" if you cannot get to the next world when your using non-progressive worlds
- _Hopefully_ a real fix for boss door looping not crashing... hopefully... please...
---
# Huge thanks and respect to [Eszenn](https://github.com/Eszenn/) for all the work they did. Best of wishes to them.
## Big thanks still goes to @cloiss + (discord) ``activegalacticnucleus`` for their contributions to 0.3.0

# [Installation Steps here](https://github.com/DDR-Khat/Spelunky2-Archipelago?tab=readme-ov-file#installation-instructions)
0.3.8.title: Spelunky 2 Archipelago v0.3.8

0.3.9.description:
This is an update to both APworld + Client. Anything prior **_WILL_** break.
# What's New
## Shortcuts!
Now each world has a direct shortcut from the camp. Either when you have access, or you decide to lock them into the multiworld (just like world access)
## Deathlink Grace!
Other players die, maybe too much. Now you can ignore (0 -> 10) of their deaths before it kills you..
## Moar Deathlink options
In-game (CTRL + F4 to bring up the menu in-game if you need to) you can turn off deathlinks wholesale (reserve it for problems...) or make it that rather than immediately dying you explode instead which you _might_ survive
## Iron-man Mode!
If you used a shortcut, you won't be allowed into your goal world. Get there properly!
## ALL THE DAMSELS!
You like Doge-only? Well, we need you to find hampster and catto too! So we'll just swap them in until you send their checks ;)

## Bug fixes!
- Coffins are _**for real this time**_ sorted.
- Cosmic Ocean not having the right amount of CO checkpoints (Thanks @thejoshwolfe )
- Deathlink is no longer super laggy (and doesn't send a death if you have an Ankh... derp)
- Hou Yi's Bow + Ankh leave a filler item if they are locked out
- Sunken City skip logic mistake (Thx @sebysebyseby )
---
# Huge thanks and respect to [Eszenn](https://github.com/Eszenn/) for all the work they did. Best of wishes to them.
## Big thanks still goes to @cloiss + (discord) ``activegalacticnucleus`` for their contributions to 0.3.0

# [Installation Steps here](https://github.com/DDR-Khat/Spelunky2-Archipelago?tab=readme-ov-file#installation-instructions)
0.3.9.title: Spelunky 2 Archipelago v0.3.9

0.4.0.description:
This is an update to both APworld + Client. Anything older than 0.3.9 _**WILL**_ break, but 0.3.9 had some dumb bugs so you should just update to this.
# What's New
Just fixes, sorry.

## Bug fixes!
- Starter character's locations are NOT added the multiworld (Roffy, stop holding important Multiworld items! We already HAVE you!!)
- Added extra delay after receiving deathlink (stop killing people because you were killed by exploding, silly)
- "ALL" locked items option is no longer breaks everything (Turns out, missing important values breaks stuff... who knew?)
- Deathlinks out of game are now ignored (Who even dies when we've not even started the sync? Turns out there are some...)
- Removed "Shield" from default Waddler options (It causes things to get crushed, crazy, I know)
- Gracefully handle and warn when filler/trap weights aren't set up right. (Some people just put everything to 0. Weird.)
---
# Huge thanks and respect to [Eszenn](https://github.com/Eszenn/) for all the work they did. Best of wishes to them.
## Big thanks still goes to @cloiss + (discord) ``activegalacticnucleus`` for their contributions to 0.3.0

# [Installation Steps here](https://github.com/DDR-Khat/Spelunky2-Archipelago?tab=readme-ov-file#installation-instructions)
0.4.0.title: Spelunky 2 Archipelago v0.4.0
